Plot: The true story of a Fundamentalist Mormon leader who spent more than a year on the FBI's "10 Most Wanted List" for unlawful flight on charges related to his alleged arrangement of illegal marriages involving underage girls.
Title: Outlaw Prophet: Warren Jeffs
Writer: Steve Kornacki (teleplay), Alyson Evans (teleplay), Bryce Kass (teleplay), Stephen Singular (book)
Actors: Tony Goldwyn, Molly Parker, Joey King, David Keith
